quotes.quote: I do not believe in excuses. I believe in hard work as the prime solvent of life's problems.
Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
You work hard for your income, and that hard work is what fuels the economy.
Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
Work hard and wait for the fulfillment of future events.
I do not know anyone who has got to the top without hard work. That is the recipe. It will not always get you to the top, but should get you pretty near.
Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.
If you work hard enough and assert yourself, and use your mind and imagination, you can shape the world to your desires.
Nothing worthwhile comes easily. Work, continuous work, and hard work, is the only way to accomplish results that last.
For every two minutes of glamour, there are eight hours of hard work.
Nobody's a natural. You work hard to get good and then work to get better.
I think hard work is what gets most people to the top.
There is no substitute for hard work.
If you really believe in what you're doing, work hard, take nothing personally and if something blocks one route, find another. Never give up.
Hard work keeps the wrinkles out of the mind and spirit.
Hard work doesn't guarantee success, but improves its chances.
Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don't turn up at all.
I learned the value of hard work by working hard.
Whether you dream big or dream small, chances are your dream will come true if you believe in it and really work hard on it.
A good idea is about ten percent and implementation and hard work, and luck is 90 percent.
The fruit of your own hard work is the sweetest.
Success is reserved for you if you persevere; it's not deserved by you if you are indolent!
Don't give up; try again. Be still and work it out till your good becomes the best! Dream high above the sky!
What separates a weak dreamer and a great dreamer is who is wishing and waiting or who is willing and working.
Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven't planted.
Believe in yourself, and the rest will fall into place. Have faith in your own abilities, work hard, and there is nothing you cannot accomplish.
The person that works the hardest wins.
Hard work is painful when life is devoid of purpose. But when you live for something greater than yourself and the gratification of your own ego, then hard work becomes a labor of love.
Enjoy your sweat because hard work doesn't guarantee success, but without it you don't have a chance.
There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
